<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/polymer/polymer.html">
 
<dom-module id="hypervideo-preview">
  <style>
    #wrapper {
      position: absolute;
    }
    #icon {
      position: absolute;
      padding: 18px 17px;
      line-height: 10px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background-color:#DCDCDC;/*var(--light-divider-color);*/
      color: #212121;/*var(--light-divider-color);*/
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: bold;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
  </style>
  <template>
    <div id="wrapper">
      <div id="icon" on-tap="showPos">
        H
      </div>
    </div>
  </template>
  <script>
  hypervideoPreview = Polymer({
    is: 'hypervideo-preview',
    properties: {
      hypervideo: {
        type: Object,
        value: null
      }
    },
    factoryImpl: function(hypervideo) {
      this.hypervideo = hypervideo;
    },
    attached: function() {
      Polymer.dom.flush();
      this._w = this.$.icon.clientWidth;
      this._col = this.hypervideo.col;
      this._row = this.hypervideo.row;
      this.moveToPos();
      this.id = "_"+this.hypervideo._id;
    },
    moveToPos: function() {
      this.$.wrapper.style.left = this._x - this._w/2+"px";
      this.$.wrapper.style.top = this._y - this._w/2+"px";
    },
    getPos(){
      return {
        x: this._x,
        y: this._y,
      };
    },
  });
  </script>
</dom-module>
 
Generated by istanbul at Wed Nov 11 2015 02:32:23 GMT-0200 (BRST)
